basics.name: Daniel Rosehill
basics.label: Communications & Technical Professional
basics.summary: A versatile communications professional with over a decade of experience bridging technical and business domains. Specialized in technical writing, documentation, and strategic communications for complex technology products. Passionate about artificial intelligence, with expertise in RAG systems, prompt engineering, AI agents, and LLM evaluations. Proven track record in developing comprehensive content strategies, managing knowledge bases, and delivering clear, impactful communication solutions across cybersecurity, cloud computing, and emerging technologies.
